post.body: Sounds like a good resolution! I will make the resolution as one to meet by 2009's end, too expensive to buy all at once.
Lulz - aorta! --- Everyone cancelled on me. Sitting home alone.
Here here. Drive up to my place really quick and let's play Cranium. :)
That might be one I'm invited to for all I know. I don't know. I just know the one where I knew the hosts was cancelled.
There's two parties I'm invited to, and was supposed to go out clubbing, but people cancelled, don't feel up to anything ATM
I think the biggest hurdle of "cloud media" will be the net neutrality problems we will face, blu-ray is a nice supplement
iTunes has pretty good quality on their small offering of HD titles. abc.com has fantastic quality on a few shows as well
You're supposed to capitalize holidays, correct? I wrote "...New Year" I suppose it should've been "N. Y.'s Day," eh?
OMG Abuelo's sounds amazing today.
I hadn't seen the first two. Kinda surprised they are on 3 already. Milk that cash cow!
I just don't get wet if I have no towel, and shower at home
What a shitty New Years Eve. At least I have @roborobyn and @lobsterrific to share my misery with.
It doesn't have bells and whistles as I see so far. But the pop up menu looks way cooler than many I've seen. The quality is great too.
Putting Tori Amos: Live at Montreux into my blu-ray player. I'll let you know how bad of a blu-ray it is, sure to be, shortly.
"The stars! I saw the stars outside her window! I can navigate by the stars!" Thanks Alex, as if it's a special way only some sailors use.
What I did find cool about the whole thing was "Oh! I think I'll twitter this, that would be fun!" :D --- addicted!
Being that I think it would be a waste of time to give me a ticket for the darn incident. I think it was the same cop from a few months ago
Got a warning. He was just looking for an excuse to run my licence it looked like. He was nice. It went as bad as it could really.
He is still in his car with my licence. Hopefully no ticket. That would be unfair. Didn't know it was a dead end.
Stopped by a cop for not signalling at least 100 feet before a turn. He just wanted to pull me over.
